titles.title: EIDL Advance Protection Act
EIDL Advance Protection Act
A bill to amend the CARES Act to provide that EIDL emergency grant advance payments shall not be subject to certain reductions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
EIDL Advance Protection Act
This bill prohibits reducing an applicant's loan forgiveness under the Paycheck Protection Program based on an advance amount received by the applicant under the Economic Injury Disaster Loan program.
